overview_of_class: Using the broad range of media now easily available on the internet, this course will provide an opportunity to learn about current issues in Europe as examined through German language media. Print articles, radio broadcasts, TV news shows, and other internet sources now allow immediate access to news sources and we will use these sources during class discussions and activities to investigate Immigration and Integration in Germany, the Euro and the EU Financial Crisis, Film and Cultural Production, Issues in Education and Economics in Germany and Europe.
name: Current Events in German Media
subject: GERMAN
